fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to evict. You search through their stuff and learn if they're suspicious.
- If you evict good players, they are also roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must evict a player on night 1. Tenants hate their landlord, but it's a necessary profession. How else are you going to earn your living wage?
- You start with a target at the start of the game called "Single Mom", who you are not informed of. If you evict your single mom, you instantly are promoted to Corporate. The Single Mom will always be a Commoner.
